name: StrokeStyle
desc: The object for defining the color, width, and style of a border or divider.

items.name: style
items.desc: Defines the style of the stroke. Valid values:solid (default): A solid stroke _______ dashed: A dashed stroke – – – – – dotted: A dotted stroke ••••••••

items.name: width
items.desc: The width of the stroke line. Can be either a number in points, or a string according to Specifying Measurements for Components.
